website_summaries.verdict: A very affordable phone from Huawei with great photo performance for selfies and general photography.
pros: 16 megapixel camera makes this phone perfect for high quality selfies without needing to use the rear camera
Phone comes with 32GB of internal memory for a large number of songs, apps, pictures, and other files
cons: The white color smartphone is prone to getting dirty without the protection of a separate phone case

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this phone.
customer_reviews.text: This phone is exactly what I was looking for; A very large, bright screen, loud speaker (wish it had stereo speakers, but hey, no complaints here) and even with 3 gigs of RAM, it's still fast with the Kirin 710 processor. Also cames with Android Oreo out of the box. The Huawei cloud services that they offer isn't available in the US, but no big deal when Google keeps everything on their cloud. I did use the help app to ask some questions about settings and got answers back within in a few hours from Huawei's help team. Overall, a great phone at a great price. BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M

customer_reviews.title: Alternative to the Honor 8x
customer_reviews.text: Closest phone to the Honor 8x which isn't released in the US. The screen is huge, very bright. The design is beautiful with blue backing, though which it was glass like the 8x. The phone is fast and snappy though ram management is aggressive and you will be reloading apps. The battery life is phenomenal, lasts 2 days sometimes. People tell me at times they call me but I did not receive call, if it wasn't for that I would give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone!
customer_reviews.text: At this price point, you can't go wrong. This is a quality phone without doubt. Large screen with good color saturation and clarity. Good sound. A plethora of native settings to tweak the phone to suit your visual and performance needs. This is a not a Samsung Note 10! But for the features and performance at a little over $200, this "beats the brakes off" a phone that cost $600 more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dislike
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the fact that the ID I'm supposed to use with the phone isn't even available where I registered the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Girl

customer_reviews.title: Very bad phone. Wasting of money
customer_reviews.text: Very poor phone... Battery is no good... Screen got freeze it self....don't buy it.... And I don't want your Refund..... Keep it for your self....
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This hone was bought for my 9 year old sister. For the price it performs extremely well. Design is sleek and classy. Screen is big and bright. Speakers are quite loud.
customer_reviews.author: jameika jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, will soon be useless - T-Mobile decomming 2G, 3G, this device does NOT support VoLTE
customer_reviews.text: This device was intended to be an upgrade from my wife's Mate SE - newer, better camera, faster CPU, more storage, etc. Now the device randomly fails to see incoming calls, and I found from my carrier that since the JKM-LX3 does NOT support VoLTE, despite Huawei's web site saying it does, despite trying the Settings Database Editor app, as soon as T-Mobile finishes decom of 2G, 3G, this phone will be useless everywhere in the US. The camera is great, fingerprint reader has been perfect, no issues with face unlock, the device is fantastic, yet will soon be utterly useless except as a toy. And the kicker is I can't even donate it.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Best phone ive ever owned. Worked flawlessly for 3 mo, but now it won't connect to my network anymore. It will read "no service". I have switched carriers, and have spoken to 3 different reps with 3 different carriers, and they all say it's my phone. I'll be going back to apple or Samsung from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Moriah Jeanae

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Quality of the thousand dollar phones for way less.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: USA not on their cloud services
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone, but can't give it 5 stars as I've discovered it's not eligible to register with cloud services. When you go to register it, it asks your country, and USA isn't a choice. I called support and they acknowledged that fact and said to transfer my photos, etc from my old phone I would have to install the app "Phone Clone" on both phones and go from there.
customer_reviews.author: lemmr

customer_reviews.title: So impressed....
customer_reviews.text: I haven't even gotten to setting this phone up, I just had to post about what a surprise opening the box was! Included were a case, screen protector, a sim port key, charger, an American wall plug and earbuds!!! Holy cow! Such bang for the buck! I am truly impressed. I will never buy "American" again.
customer_reviews.author: dwiffiee

customer_reviews.title: Good but not the best
customer_reviews.text: The operating system seems to work fast and fairly well. The only drawback is the battery life. If everything is turned on, the battery will run down pretty fast. I saw one guy on the web testing the battery life with the clock on this model. It's unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Prakit Trakulwatanachai

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Phone value of $1,000 or more
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone. it is value of $1,000 or more. the best phone in the market of 2019. Great battery life. after register for SIM Card is 4G LTE very fast, very responding, very smooth, every thing is excellent. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered precisely as described. The box was sealed after a fast delivery. After unboxing I was able to configure the language of the phone to my own language. Camera is pretty great and I can play smoothly games without lag. A micro simcard does not fit so I had to use a nano simcard. Now I can enjoy 3G, 4G and 4G+ in my country. Also a 3.5mm audio jack is great so I can listen to my favourite music.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this phone. Battery lasts forever.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia W

customer_reviews.title: Display fail after only 3 months of ownership.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed...I've barely had this phone for 3 months and it no longer works. The display has blacked out and I cannot do anything on it. I don't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not unlocked and company is very rude.
customer_reviews.text: Not unlocked. Contacted multiple GSM networks. Contacted company and they couldn't care less.
customer_reviews.author: Pers22

customer_reviews.title: Bad phone
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. I have had this phone for 6 months and do not receive all phone calls or texts. I don't blame my carrier for this because other people on my plan with different phones have no issues. My niece had the same model for only 2 months and the screen randomly broke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The demise of iPhones
customer_reviews.text: Not even the top model for Huawei Annie kicks the life out of any Samsung or Apple device
customer_reviews.author: Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Battery life good quality can only get my free music apps on my hauwei
customer_reviews.text: Great phone love it used all day with music at work from 8:20 to 4:30 ish come back home battery still on 86 % now that pretty f*** awesome I might say don't have to bring a charger with me as well and thats if your phone is fully charged up for that day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Big screen. Long battery. I wish it were a little bit faster, but it holds up well for the most part. Only ran into a few bugs here and there. Nothing a restart cant fix. It restarts very fast too. Decent camera quality. Overall, great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Big phone with great capacity in storage
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Super battery and easy connectivity with every nework. Good photos... Look beautiful !!!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Fast, great pics, sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: Phone is fast. No glitches. Takes great pics! Sound quality is great. I would recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: GolfnNut

customer_reviews.title: Not working properly with metro PCS network
customer_reviews.text: This model is not working properly with metro PCS. I tried 2 different new phones. Often incoming call goes to voicemail
customer_reviews.author: Vin

customer_reviews.title: Great phone and great size.
customer_reviews.text: I love the large screen, with so many great features and easy to navigate. Love the teal color too. I have Cricket cell phone service and everything transferred over very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Munno

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my ten year old. He's not complaining.
customer_reviews.author: starter73

customer_reviews.title: Cell phone
customer_reviews.text: Phone is amazing thus far. Set up was kind of difficult, but afterwards best phone I have had to date.
customer_reviews.author: David Platte

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: No issues so far. Have been using it for an year now with dual SIM. Meets expectations for the price.
customer_reviews.author: WM

customer_reviews.title: Check it out if it works with 4G network
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work with 4G in Afghanistan and may it won't in most Asian and European countries, I just waste my money for nothing
customer_reviews.author: Pavle

customer_reviews.title: I was afraid but did not repentance
customer_reviews.text: It was simply the best, it was unlocked to work in Honduras and everything is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kathia F. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Good for a person who loves taking pics
customer_reviews.text: I just love my new phone... I just can't wait to show it to my friends and I love all the features
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Phone will last you forever
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone I won't be going back to any other kind of phone!!
customer_reviews.author: Paris ware

customer_reviews.title: Think twice spending money on these type of phones.
customer_reviews.text: One of the phones does not work, does not get signal , and the camera does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone with wide big screen and good camera really happy with my purchase❤️
customer_reviews.author: Soma99

customer_reviews.title: Yosycor
customer_reviews.text: Very good celular by the cost. The camera could be better but is enough good.
customer_reviews.author: yosanly

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Good budget phone, work,s great, camera OK, bang for the bucks
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Only goes to 4g. Lte supported in other country. No update to Android 9 as of yet.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Blows everything else out the water for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Darnell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone, excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful phone, very responsive, large screen, have not really had time to test the camera but it should be more than adequate. It's only been several days but very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Mas N

customer_reviews.title: Android cell phone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, fast service. The cell phone is very fast, plenty of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Love this cellular telephone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. Huawei will be my forever cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Tia Tati

customer_reviews.title: It’s not scam
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! I was worried about getting a phone on amazon but it was a great experience
customer_reviews.author: Bryam Vargas
